name: libmnl

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
libmnl is a minimalistic user-space library oriented to Netlink
developers.There are a lot of common tasks in parsing, validating,
constructing of both the Netlink header and TLVs that are repetitive and
easy to get wrong.This library aims to provide simple helpers that
allows you to re-use code and to avoid re-inventing the wheel.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: iproute2
dependent_to.description: This is a set of utilities for Linux networking.

dependent_to.name: cgdcbxd
dependent_to.description:
cgdcbxd is a daemon used to monitor DCB netlink events and manage the
net_prio control group subsystem. The daemon keeps the hierarchy and
priority mappings in sync with DCBX Application events

dependent_to.name: libnftnl
dependent_to.description:
A library for low-level interaction with nftables Netlink's API over
libmnl.

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-cthelper
dependent_to.description: Libnetfilter-cthelper library for user space helpers / ALGs

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-conntrack
dependent_to.description:
libnetfilter_conntrack is a userspace library providing a programming
interface (API) to the in-kernel connection tracking state table.
